>
[Unimpeded Step](/Feats.aspx?ID=5889) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 94 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[liberation cause](/Causes.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

With a burst of divine liberation, your ally's movement from your [Liberating Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=2808) is unaffected by [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453), greater difficult terrain, [narrow surfaces](/Rules.aspx?ID=2369), and [uneven ground](/Rules.aspx?ID=2370). If you have the exalted reaction benefit, this applies to everyone who Steps.
name: Unimpeded Step
